item.title: on why we need more hackers
item.description: We all want to reach our own definition of success in life. Be it on maintaining a good relationship with an old friend from high school, achieve a prestigious award from an institution, or simply to be able to travel the world with our loved one. And interestingly, people with roughly same goals have different time duration for each to achieve it. Some can do it in 1 year or two, while others need 5 or more years to accomplish the same life target.
